Any Dead Person You Wanna Talk to you? 
 
 I talk to dead people, any one that's dead you wanna talk to, I can dig em up and tell you about your own Medical Records! 
 
 Yup! I got connections all ova. I look up your Credit Cards, your Social Sec# and can tell you stuff about you that even you don't know!
 
 My dead-beats will canvas your neighborhood and find out all sorts of stupid stuff you've been saying when your around people, and don't remember!
 
 Let the dead help you! Post a reply, and the dead will appear for violations...
 uuuhhh verification, uuuuhhhh vacinations, uuuuuhhh a 4 your DMV Validation!
 
 Pay no attention to the little mic in my ear.... I talk to the dead, and they love to talk back to me. Enjoy life with the dead! Let the dead into your life!
 
 Just send a post letting me know who you wanna talk to, and I'll see if they're
 not too busy to pop in and talk your last D & C!!!
 
 Does anyone really buy that XXXX???
